contributors.name: 克林．伊斯威特
contributors.message: When a man's got money in his pocket, he begins to appreciate peace.

contributors.name: 華特．懷特
contributors.message:
There are going to be some things that you'll come to learn about me in the next few days.
I just want you to know that no matter how it may look, I only had you in my heart. Goodbye.
